meanings.sent1: Finding a four-leaf clover is ultrarare.
meanings.sent2: The chance of winning the lottery is ultrarare.
meanings.sent3: Seeing a cat walk on its hind legs is ultrarare!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was as ultrarare as a diamond in the rough.
meanings.sent5: The ancient artifact was an ultrarare find.

meanings.sent1: The ultrarare gem sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The ultrarare painting was worth millions.
meanings.sent3: His ultrarare talent for juggling made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The ultrarare perfume transported her to a field of flowers.
meanings.sent5: The ultrarare antique clock chimed melodiously.
